DATATEXT: Based on article 13 of the federal constitution of switzerland and the federal dataprotection assignments (Datenschutzgesetz, DSG) every person has a right for the protection of her privacy, aswell as the protction of misuse of her personal data. We keep those assignments. Personal data is handled strictly confidential and isn't sold to third parties or passed further away.
IMP_TEXT: This App was developped of the health informatics department of the University of Applied Sciences of Bern for the neurology department of the University of Zurich.
Q2COREL: Do you have movementrestrictions in your left hand?
Q2CORER: Do you have movementrestrictions in your right hand?
Q3COREL: Do you have sensory disturbances in your left hand?
Q3CORER: Do you have sensory disturbances in your right hand?
Q5CORE: How do you judge your current concentration abilities?
Q6CORE: Had you a MS relapse since the last exercise session?
Q7CORE: Did your MS Symptome increase since the last exercise session?
TEMPLATEPOPUP_NEXTPREPZS: Now the prepartion starts, the actual exercise with a defined amount of time, will start after this preparation.
SDTEMPLATE_POPUP: The preparation is over. As soon as you click OK, the actual exercise starts.

MSISQS1: In the past two weeks, how much has your MS limited your ability to...
MSISQS2: In the past two weeks, how much have you been bothered by...
ZS-INSTRUCTION: Choose according to the referencetable, the appropriate digit of the digittable to the symbol above the green space.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_2: Each symbol is matches excatly to one digit.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_3: In the uppermost table, the referencetable, you see which digit matches which symbol.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_4: In the intermediate table, the solutiontable, only the symols are set, the appropriate digits are missing.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_5: In the bottommost table, the digittable, you see the digits, which you can tap. Tap allways on the digit that matches the symbol above the empty space in the solutiontable. You can look for the appropriate digit according to the definition in the referencetable.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_6: If you tap on Next, you start the prepartion. There you have 3 times the possibility to complete one row. As soon as you have completed one row correctly, the actual exercise begins.
ZS-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_7: Important: During the exercise you should not be disturbed!
ROUTE-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_2: The computer shows you a way through the labyrinth.
ROUTE-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_3:
The way is shown you only once.
As soon as the demonstrated way of the computer reaches the end, it's your turn.
ROUTE-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_4: Start at the Start (by tapping on start).
ROUTE-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_5: Try afterwards to tap the points of the way in the same order as the computer has demonstrated it.
ROUTE-INSTRUCTION_TEXT_6: The exercise is over, if you reach the end(by tapping on end).
FSS_Q: During the past week, I have found that:

QUESTIONS.text: 1. My motivation is lower when I am fatigued.
4. Fatigue interferes with my physical functioning.
5. Fatigue causes frequent problems for me.
6. My fatigue prevents sustained physical functioning.
7. Fatigue interferes with carrying out certain duties and responsibilities.
8. Fatigue is among my most disabling symptoms.
9. Fatigue interferes with my work, family, or social life.
